title: Why does the TDAP vaccine warning label list autism and SIDS as possible side effects?
description: Answer (1 of 5): Because the warning label lists ANY symptoms or issues that happen within a close period of time after the vaccine is given. There is absolutely no comment made on causation, only that there is a time correlation. If you pick anything that a baby does, and ask for any problems th...
